case_title: Mrs. LILAVATI HARCHANDANI vs MONICA KAMRAN DOST and others
respondent: Mrs. Monica Kamran Dost and others
issues_fraged: Non-compliance of sections 54 and 55 of Representation of People Act, 1976
Whether lot was drawn in accordance with law
Objection to the manner of drawing lot
Estoppel from challenging the manner of drawing lot
Maintainability without grounds under section 68 of Representation of People Act, 1976

key_findings.issue_1: Petition is not liable to be dismissed for non-compliance of sections 54 and 55.
key_findings.issue_2_3_4: Lot was not drawn in accordance with law; violation of mandatory provisions of Rule 66(5).
key_findings.issue_5: Petition is maintainable under section 70 of Representation of People Act, 1976.

facts.seat_type: Provincial Assembly of Sind reserved for non-Muslim women
facts.voting_method: Proportional representation by means of single transferable vote
facts.electoral_college: Eight non-Muslim members of Provincial Assembly of Sind

grievance: Returning Officer violated rules by declaring the name picked first in the lot as winner instead of excluding it.
decision: Whole election declared void; fresh election directed to be held following Chapter III of rules.
